cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 2 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Basic Pod in a room of 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: A Single Pod in a Mixed 4 Pod room. Please note some rooms may contain a mix of Queen and Single Pods.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 2 nights stay on your dates

dorms.labelDescription: A Single pod in a mixed 8 bed dorm. There are 4 single pods and 4 queen pods in this room, along with an ensuite toilet.

dorms.labelDescription: There are 2 Single pods and 2 Queen pods in this mixed dorm room. Queen Pod listings are single occupancy and cannot be booked for 2 people.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 22nd Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 22nd Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
